Package chess

Class Move

java.lang.Object
chess.Move
public class Move
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents and contains all of the details about a particular move.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Seth Steinbrook and Getty Muthiani

  • Constructor Summary

    Move constructor.

    int getColumnFrom()

    Gets the column the piece moved to.

    Gets the move in long algebraic notation.
    PieceType getPieceMoved()
    Gets the type of piece that was moved.

    Gets the row the piece moved from.

    Gets the row the piece moved to.

    Gets if the move was en passant.

    Gets if the move was a pawn promotion.

    Sets the pawn promotion flag to true.

  • Constructor Details

    • Move

      public Move​(java.lang.String move, int rFrom, int colFrom, int rTo, int colTo, PieceType pieceType)
      Move constructor.
      Parameters:
      move - String of the move in long algebraic notation
      rFrom - int row the piece is moving from
      colFrom - int column the piece is moving from
      rTo - int row the piece is moving to
      colTo - int column the piece is moving to
      pieceType - PieceType for what piece was moved
